editorialDecl.p: The Oxford-BYU Syriac Corpus is a joint project of the University of Oxford and Brigham Young University in collaboration with Vanderbilt University and the Initiative for Digital Humanities, Media, and Culture at Texas A&M University.

langUsage.language: Unvocalized Syriac of any variety or period

div.l: ܥܲܠ ܡ̇ܢ ܠܵܐ ܟܠ̣ܵܝܗܝ ܡ̣ܢ ܗܵܕܹܐ ܀
ܒܗܵܒܹܝܠ ܐܘܼܪܚܵܐ ܐܸܬܿܕܲܪܫܲܬ̤: ܘܲܫܪܝܼ ܡܵܘܬܵܐ ܕܢܸܪܕܸܿܐ ܒܵܗ̇.
